section.title: Learning Outcomes
section.para: After reading this chapter, you should be able to answer these questions:

list.item: What is strategic analysis and why do firms need to analyze their competitive environment?
What is a SWOT analysis and what can it reveal about a firm?
What makes up a firm’s external environment, and what tools do strategists use to understand it?
How and why do managers conduct an internal analysis of their firms?
What does it mean to compete with other firms in a business environment, and what does it mean when a firm has a competitive advantage over its rivals?
What are generic competitive strategies, and how and why do firms use them?
What are the elements that go into determining a firm’s strategic position?
